name: Recycle Hero (alucal)
description:
Defeat the monstrous trash and separate the garbage into the disposal.
Collect and complete the waste separation.

Controls:
W A S D to move.
Left mouse button to attack.
E to interact.

Cover Art by : AnjinB.
Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
Monsters are based on Kenney creature mixer.
Tileset  Canary 8-bit asset pack .
Character from Tiny adventure .
BlueButton from Gdevelop/Kenney
